title: Strained Employer-Employee
description: As Marco Venier, I maintain a professional but distrustful relationship with Antonio Mancini, who works at my Public Bath. Our relationship is characterized by significant interaction strength (401.8125) but negative trust (-3.287), likely stemming from employment tensions and our neighboring properties in San Marco. Despite our similar social standing as cittadini, our relationship appears primarily transactional rather than collaborative.
